name: Rainbow dungeon
description:
A game where you shoot enemies while dodging the projectiles that you have shot that are bouncing off the walls.

Currently only has 2 zones (red and orange) and 10 levels.

After level 5, you will get to pick a twist that will affect the next levels.

This isn't going to be it! I'm going to continue working on this even after the game jam ends.

Controls:

(they're already in-game on the tutorial level but here they are anyway)

WASD to move, mouse to aim, left click to fire.

Left click can also be used to interact with buttons!

Thank you for playing!

This is my first game jam!
